options.name: Flourish
options.description: Gain +1 Performance and +1 Damage to Weapon Attacks

options.name: Reaction : Parry
options.description: After a Creature makes a Melee Attack roll on you or against a Creature that is Adjacent to you, roll a 1d4 subtract that amount from the Attack Check.

options.name: Action : Make Space
options.description: If there are two or more enemies adjacent to you, make a sweeping Attack, making a single roll against all adjacent targets. You can immediately move 2 units without provoking Reactions.

options.name: Action : Challenge
options.description: You use your Focus issue a challenge to to a Creature, causing your Attacks to deal an extra 1d8 Damage.  This effect persists until someone other than you does Damage to this Creature. This Focus cannot be broken by taking damage.

options.name: Master Duelist
options.description: Gain +1 to Melee Attacks and +1 Block.
